heisig_chinese_memo: The car went through the crossing too speedy and was hooked by the cops down the road.
heisig_constituent: swift, fishhook, cross, ten, needle, road
heisig_story: Here we see a crossing in the form of a barbed fishhook, suggesting a swifter alternate not only to the roundabouts used in Europe but also to the "cloverleaf" design used on superhighways in the United States.

jp_example_words: 迅速(じんそく): quick, fast, rapid, swift, prompt
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You drive your scooter off this cliff, holding your cross tight to your chest, at a swift speed.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine swiftly shooting off the side of the cliff on your scooter, holding the cross for dear life.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Because you had such a swift take off, you didn't notice that your jeans (じん) were ripped right off your body. Until now.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you're swiftly shooting through the sky as your jeans flutter down toward the ground behind you. You also feel a swift breeze on all of your downstairs bits now.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The car went through the crossing too speedy and was hooked by the cops down the road.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", "卂" sound. The original meaning is fast and fast. "Shuowen": "Quick, sickness. Congrui, Xiansheng." Such as "Book of Rites. "Yuzao": "The residence of a gentleman is a permanent household, and the head of the east of the bed is Hengdong. If there is strong wind, thunder, and heavy rain, it will change." "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "In midsummer, thunder and lightning are swift, breaking trees, ruining houses, and sometimes committing murder."

" Xun " also means that the wolf is powerful. "Er Ya. "Shi Beast": "Wolf: male, wolf; wolves, wolf; its son, deer; extremely powerful, fast." Xing Bing quoted the Sheren and said: "wolf, the male name is the wolf, the male name is the wolf, and the son is the male name. The most powerful person is named Xun."
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", "卂" sound. The original meaning is fast and fast.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「卂」聲。本義是疾速、迅速。《說文》：「迅，疾也。从辵，卂聲。」如《禮記．玉藻》：「君子之居恆當戶，寢恆東首，若有疾風、迅雷、甚雨，則必變。」《論衡．雷虛》：「盛夏之時，雷電迅疾，擊折樹木，壞敗室屋，時犯殺人。」

　　「迅」也表示狼有力者。《爾雅．釋獸》：「狼：牡，貛；牝，狼；其子，獥；絕有力，迅。」邢昺疏引舍人曰：「狼，牡名貛，牝名狼，其子名獥，絕有力者名迅。」
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「卂」聲。本義是疾速、迅速。

①快：迅速。迅即。迅疾。迅捷。迅猛。迅雷不及掩耳。［例］藨者若鹿迅走。——《周书·王会》。［例］迅雷风烈。——《论语》。［例］年往迅劲矢。——陆机《长歌行》。［例］若疾霆转雷而激迅风也。——张衡《东京赋》。［例］候鸣鸡以进帆，趋乱流以争迅。——唐·高适《东征赋》。［例］迅雷甚雨。——《广东军务记》。［例］迅不可捉。——《聊斋志异·促织》。［合］迅指(巡指间。弹指间)；迅羽(形容快飞的鸟)；迅走(走得很快)。

迅速(じんそく): quick, fast, rapid, swift, prompt

從「 辵 」，「 卂 」聲。本義是疾速、迅速。《說文》：「迅，疾也。从辵，卂聲。」如《禮記．玉藻》：「君子之居恆當戶，寢恆東首，若有疾風、迅雷、甚雨，則必變。」《論衡．雷虛》：「盛夏之時，雷電迅疾，擊折樹木，壞敗室屋，時犯殺人。」 「 迅 」也表示狼有力者。《爾雅．釋獸》：「狼：牡，貛；牝，狼；其子，獥；絕有力，迅。」邢昺疏引舍人曰：「狼，牡名貛，牝名狼，其子名獥，絕有力者名迅。」
From " 辵", " 卂" sound. The original meaning is fast and fast. "Shuowen": "Quick, sickness. Congrui, Xiansheng." Such as "Book of Rites. "Yuzao": "The residence of a gentleman is a permanent household, and the head of the east of the bed is Hengdong. If there is strong wind, thunder, and heavy rain, it will change." "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "In midsummer, thunder and lightning are swift, breaking trees, ruining houses, and sometimes committing murder." " Xun" also means that the wolf is powerful. "Er Ya. "Shi Beast": "Wolf: male, wolf; wolves, wolf; its son, deer; extremely powerful, fast." Xing Bing quoted the Sheren and said: "wolf, the male name is the wolf, the male name is the wolf, and the son is the male name. The most powerful person is named Xun."

迅字的基本解释

迅
xùn
快：迅速。迅即。迅疾。迅捷。迅猛。迅雷不及掩耳。

迅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xùn］
［《廣韻》息晋切，去震，心。］
［《廣韻》私閏切，去稕，心。］
(1)快，迅速。
(2)兽名。指狼有力者。
(3)通“迿”。超越。参见“迅衆”。

迅字的英文翻译

◎ 迅
fast, swift

迅字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迅； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1253第26
【唐韻】息進切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】思晉切，?音信。【說文】疾也。【楚辭·九章】羌迅高而難當。又【爾雅·釋獸】狼，其子獥，絕有力，迅。【註】狼子絕有力者曰迅。【疏】迅，疾也。　又【廣韻】私閏切【集韻】須閏切，?音浚。義同。

迅字的源字形

迅字的起名意思

：一般指迅速，快，表示及时、充满活力。

飞;孔(xan )兼表声。本义是快、迅速。

EHR 前限航的 aet
быстрый
Зная слово.
Письмо печати всегда (юань), как ступня (остановка), идущая по дороге (ㄔ), что означает быструю ходьбу; от дыры дыра - это исходное слово для Сюнь, и это быстро и летит, что означает что действие быстрое, как полет; отверстие (xan) также звук стола.
Первоначальный смысл быстр и быстр.
Быстро; быстро: ~ скорость | ~ цзи | ~ гром не может скрыть ваши уши.
~ Шаг ~ то есть срочный ~ быстрый ~ быстрый ~ яростный ~ гром ~ скорость

Radicals: 厂, 十  (cliff, cross, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You drive your scooter off this cliff, holding your cross tight to your chest, at a swift speed.
Imagine swiftly shooting off the side of the cliff on your scooter, holding the cross for dear life.
Reading Mnemonic
Because you had such a swift take off, you didn't notice that your jeans (じん) were ripped right off your body. Until now.
Now you're swiftly shooting through the sky as your jeans flutter down toward the ground behind you. You also feel a swift breeze on all of your downstairs bits now.
